title: Let Us Not Live in Ignorance
description: Set against the backdrop of Lebanon's civil war and spanning three continents, "Let Us Not Live in Ignorance" is a story of hope and a story of love -- familial, fraternal, romantic.Michael Flanagan and Hector Nordheim have been friends since childhood. Well-educated, well-traveled, and successful, they lack for little. When Michael becomes interested in Milo Khoury, a beautiful woman from Lebanon, Hector is glad for him despite their cultural differences. But when Hector falls in love with Milo's friend Ibtysam, he finds no support whatsoever, not even from Ibtysam herself.When should we listen to the wisdom of others and when should we follow our hearts?
author: Anastasia Abboud
